item.description:
Kent Messamore will be presenting for us. The topic this month is Metadata and the Extensible Metadata Platform.

Whether you use Lightroom or Photoshop you run into something called “Metadata.” What is it and how can it help you? Also those pesky little files with the extension “XMP”. What are they? Can I just delete them? How could I use them?

Well ... if you come to the meeting on Thursday, September 20th you'll find out. We will be meeting in room 103. Hope to see you all there.
item.name: September Manchester Adobe User Group Meeting ...
